teacherlanding.title: Scratch mō te Hunga Whakaako
teacherlanding.intro: Ka taea e ō ākonga te whakamahi i te Scratch, ki te waihanga wahere mō ō rātou ake kōrero pāhekoheko, hākorikori, kēmu rānei. I a rātou e mahi ana, ka ako rātou ki te whakaaro auaha, ki te whakaaro nahanaha, ki te mahi tahi hoki -— ngā pukenga nui mō tō tātou nei pāpori.
teacherlanding.inPracticeIntro: Ka whakamahia te Scratch e te hunga whakaako, i ngā momo mahi o ngā:
teacherlanding.generalUsageSettings: Wāhi: kura, whare taonga, whare pukapuka, whare hāpori
teacherlanding.generalUsageGradeLevels: Taumata: kura tuatahi, waenganui, tuarua (me ētahi wānanga hoki!)
teacherlanding.generalUsageSubjectAreas: Marau: te reo matatini, pūtaiao, tikanga-ā-iwi, pāngarau, pūtaiao rorohiko, ngā reo rāwaho, me ngā mahi toi
teacherlanding.scratchEdTitle: He Hāpori mō te Hunga Whakaako
teacherlanding.scratchEdDescription: He hāpori tuihono a ScratchEd, kei konei te hunga whakaako i te Scratch e tuari kōrero ana, e whakawhitiwhiti rauemi ana, e whakaputa pātai ana, e kimi tāngata ana. I waihangatia, i tutokona hoki te ScratchEd e te Harvard Graduate School of Education.
teacherlanding.meetupDescription: Ko ngā Scratch Educator Meetups, he hui mō te hunga whakaako i te Scratch e hiahia ana ki te ako tahi, whakawhitiwhiti whakaaro, me ngā rautaki hei tautoko i te auaha whakaaro rorohiko i ōna āhuatanga katoa.
teacherlanding.tttPage: Kei te whārangi Tīwhiri te huhua o ngā akoranga, ngā kāri ngohe me ngā aratohu kaiako.
teacherlanding.tipsWindow: Kei te Matapihi Tīwhiri he āwhina mō te hanga i ngā kaupapa mā Scratch.
teacherlanding.creativeComputing: Kei roto i te Creative Computing Curriculum Guide he mahere, he ngohe, he rautaki hoki hei kōkiri i ngā mahi rorohiko auaha.
teacherlanding.accountsTitle: Ngā Pūkete Pouako i te Scratch
teacherlanding.accountsDescription: Mō te hunga whakaako, ka taea te tono mō te Pūkete Pouako Scratch, kia taea ai te hanga pūkete mō ngā rōpū akonga, me te whakahaere i ngā kaupapa me ngā tākupu o ō ākonga. Kia rapu kōrero anō, tirohia te Whārangi Pātai Auau mō ngā Pūkete Pouako.
